monster.name: Tiny Servant
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) bludgeoning damage.
